SQL.LOAD: SELECT cert_id, image_id, document_type_id, scan_date, file_name, file_size_bytes, comments, user_name, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, cert_image_id FROM elp_cert_image WHERE cert_image_id = :cert_image_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_CERT_ID: SELECT cert_id, image_id, document_type_id, scan_date, file_name, file_size_bytes, comments, user_name, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, cert_image_id FROM elp_cert_image WHERE cert_id = :cert_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_cert_image SET cert_id = :cert_id, image_id = :image_id, document_type_id = :document_type_id, scan_date = :scan_date, file_name = :file_name, file_size_bytes = :file_size_bytes, comments = :comments, user_name = :user_name, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE cert_image_id = :cert_image_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_cert_image ( cert_id, image_id, document_type_id, scan_date, file_name, file_size_bytes, comments, user_name, created_by, cert_image_id ) VALUES ( :cert_id, :image_id, :document_type_id, :scan_date, :file_name, :file_size_bytes, :comments, :user_name, :created_by, :cert_image_id )
